chinese: 制造业现在可以雇佣比农业和渔业结合起来更多的人。
english: Manufacture can now employ more people than agriculture and fishing combined.

chinese: 继续学生将收到必要的申请表格。
english: Continuing students will be sent the necessary application forms.

chinese: 随着经济的扩张，消费者信心往往会增加。
english: Consumer confidence tends to increase as the economy expands.

chinese: 广播是全世界最受欢迎的娱乐形式。
english: Radio is the most popular form of entertainment throughout the world.

chinese: 均衡的饮食和定期锻炼对健康很重要。
english: A balanced diet and regular exercise are necessary for good health.

chinese: 我们的教授正在主持商业发展会议。
english: Our professor is hosting the business development conference.

chinese: 该大学已投资于专为学习设计的新技术。
english: The university has invested in new technology designed for learning.

chinese: 他们制定了一种独特的培训方法。
english: They developed a unique approach to training their employees.

chinese: 这部戏剧的海报挂在大型讲堂里。
english: The poster of this play is hung in the large lecture theater.

chinese: 试图参加会议的学生现在必须注册。
english: Students attempting to go to the conference must register now.
